hymn_title: The lord is present in His sanctuary
lyrics:
The lord is present in His sanctuary; let us praise the Lord!
The Lord is present in his people gathered here; let us praise the Lord
Praise him, Praise Him! Let us praise the Lord. Praise Him, Praise Him! Let us praise to Jesus!

The Lord is present in His sanctuary, let us sing to the Lord……
Sing to Him……Let us sing to Jesus!
